name: R4B-Signature-R5-Signature
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Signature into FHIR R5

element.display: A Signature - XML DigSig, JWS, Graphical image of signature, etc.

target.display: A Signature - XML DigSig, JWS, Graphical image of signature, etc.
target.comment: R4B `Signature` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature`

element.display: The actual signature content (XML DigSig. JWS, picture, etc.)

target.display: The actual signature content (XML DigSig. JWS, picture, etc.)
target.comment: R4B `Signature.data` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.data`
R4B `Signature.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.extension`
R4B `Signature.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.id`
R4B `Signature.onBehalfOf` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.onBehalfOf`

element.display: The technical format of the signature

target.display: The technical format of the signature
target.comment: R4B `Signature.sigFormat` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.sigFormat` - sigFormat using http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/mimetypes is exempted and assumed equivalent

element.display: The technical format of the signed resources

target.display: The technical format of the signed resources
target.comment: R4B `Signature.targetFormat` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.targetFormat` - targetFormat using http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/mimetypes is exempted and assumed equivalent

element.display: Indication of the reason the entity signed the object(s)

target.display: Indication of the reason the entity signed the object(s)
target.comment: R4B `Signature.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.type`
R4B `Signature.when` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.when`
R4B `Signature.who` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Signature.who`
